com.facebook.buck.rules

Interface Buildable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    JavaLibraryRule
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AaptPackageResources, AbstractBuildable, AndroidBinaryRule, AndroidInstrumentationApk, AndroidLibraryRule, AndroidManifest, AndroidResourceRule, ApkGenrule, AppleResource, DefaultJavaLibraryRule, DexProducedFromJavaLibraryThatContainsClassFiles, DoNotUseAbstractBuildable, DummyRDotJava, ExportFile, GenAidl, GenParcelable, Genrule, IosBinary, IosLibrary, IosTest, JavaBinaryRule, JavaTestRule, Keystore, NdkLibrary, PrebuiltJarRule, PrebuiltNativeLibrary, PreDexMerge, PythonBinaryRule, PythonLibrary, ResourcesFilter, RobolectricTestRule, ShBinaryRule, ShTestRule, UberRDotJava, XcodeNative, XcodeProjectConfig

    public interface Buildable
    Represents something that Buck is able to build, encapsulating the logic of how to determine whether the rule needs to be rebuilt and how to actually go about building the rule itself.

    • Method Detail

      • getProperties

        BuildableProperties getProperties()

      • getInputsToCompareToOutput

        Collection<Path> getInputsToCompareToOutput()
        Get the set of input files whose contents should be hashed for the purpose of determining whether this rule is cached.

        Note that inputs are iterable and should generally be alphabetized so that lists with the same elements will be .equals() to one another. However, for some build rules (such as Genrule), the order of the inputs is significant and in these cases the inputs may be ordered in any way the rule feels most appropriate.

      • getBuildSteps

        List<Step> getBuildSteps(BuildContext context,
                       BuildableContext buildableContext)
                         throws IOException
        When this method is invoked, all of its dependencies will have been built.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • appendDetailsToRuleKey

        RuleKey.Builder appendDetailsToRuleKey(RuleKey.Builder builder)
                                       throws IOException
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getPathToOutputFile

        @Nullable
Path getPathToOutputFile()
        Returns:
        the relative path to the primary output of the build rule. If non-null, this path must identify a single file (as opposed to a directory). If the Buildable outputs multiple files, this returns null.

      • getEnhancedDeps

        @Nullable
ImmutableSortedSet<BuildRule> getEnhancedDeps(BuildRuleResolver ruleResolver)
        A Buildable may employ graph enhancement to alter its dependencies. If it does this, it must return the new dependencies via this method.
        Parameters:
        ruleResolver - that can be used to get the BuildRule that corresponds to a BuildTarget if the rule for the target has already been constructed.
        Returns:
        The deps for the BuildRule that contains this Buildable. These may differ from the deps specified in the original build file due to graph enhancement. If the deps are unchanged, then this method should return null.
